packageName: Tuya Temperature Humidity Illuminance LCD Display with a Clock
author: Krassimir Kossev
releaseNotes:
2.0.1  2025-12-22 - fixed temperatureSensitivity preferece being reset to zero bug; added respondToZdoRequests preference (default: false); added TS0222 _TZ3000_hy6ncvmw illuminance only sensor
2.0.0 2025-11-30 - added child switch device support for DS18B20 group devices (relay control via DP 1); added cluster 0x0006 (On/Off) parsing for DS18B20 relay state reporting; addedadd NEO NAS-STH02B2 electrical conductivity/fertility/temperature/humidity sensor TS0601 _TZE284_rqcuwlsa; added soilEC and soilFertility attributes; soilFertility enum values: 'normal', 'lower', 'low', 'middle', 'high', 'higher'; Added ZDO 0x0000 Network Address Response and 0x0002 Node Descriptor Response handlers in an attempt to fix TS0601 _TZE284_rqcuwlsa device disconnections; Rate limiting: only respond if more than 10 seconds have passed since last response
1.8.3 ... 1.9.3 ...
1.8.2  2025-03-03 - added TS0601 _TZE204_s139roas - Ink display T/H sensor!
1.8.1  2025-02-22 - added TS000F _TZ3218_ya5d6wth in DS18B20 group (temperature only); added TS0201 _TZ3000_3xduwekl; added Temperature Unit Preference for 'TS0201_TH' group
1.8.0  2024-12-30 - HE platform 2.4.0.x compatibility patch
1.7.0  2024-11-23 - temperatureOffset and humidityOffset moved outside of the configParams; added queryAllTuyaDPs() on Refresh
1.6.8  2024-11-19 - added TS0601 _TZE284_sgabhwa6 and _TZE284_nhgdf6qr into 'TS0601_Soil_II'; added _TZE200_qrztc3ev _TZE200_snloy4rw _TZE200_eanjj2pa _TZE200_ydrdfkim into 'TS0601_Tuya' group
1.6.7  2024-10-23 - added TS0222 _TZ3000_kky16aay in a new 'TS0222_Soil' group
1.6.6  2024-08-14 - added TS0601 _TZE204_myd45weu; added TS0601 _TZE204_qyflbnbj
1.6.5  2024-08-09 - bugfix: TS0201 _TZ3000_dowj6gyi moved back to TS0201 group;
1.6.4  2024-07-23  - added Tuya Smart Soil Tester _TZE284_aao3yzhs into 'TS0601_Soil_II'
1.6.3  2024-07-16  - added TS0601 _TZE204_yjjdcqsq to TS0601_Tuya_2 group;
1.6.2  2024-06-26  - added TS000F _TZ3218_7fiyo3kv in DS18B20 group (temperature only); added Tuya cluster command '06' processing; added description in the debug logs
1.6.1  2024-06-10  - added ThirdReality 3RTHS0224Z and 3RTHS24BZ
1.6.0  2024-05-19 - added the correct NOUS TS0601 _TZE200_nnrfa68v fingerprint to group 'TS0601_Tuya'; all Current States and Preferences are cleared on initialize command;
